attributes.action: recognise the bravery of John Smetaon, with an award, for his heroics during the attacks on Glasgow Airport in Summer 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
John Smeaton was a baggage handler during the 2007 terrorist attack on Glasgow airport.

John showed the bravery that Brits are renowned for in the face of trying and adverse situations.

Faced by an ablaze terrorist John, with no thought for his own personal safety, sought to restrain the terrorist and defend his fellow country men and international travellers from the terrorists.

John Smeatons bravery has been recognised across the world and deserves this award for showing everyone in the UK that the actions of one person can make a huge difference to the lives of everyone.
